channel.title: Help hosting client
channel.description:
Alright im making a client and im done i have logged in and everything so i know it works, i need to host it so other people can download it, where do i go and how do i do that? what files do i upload idk anything bout hosting, tell me everything i need to know or a link to a tutorial please, thanks
~old nite

item.title: Help hosting client

sprites?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2007, 06:50:47 PM[/size][hr]upload everything
